com.github.privacystreams.location

Class LocationOperators

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.privacystreams.location.LocationOperators

  • @PSOperatorWrapper
public class LocationOperators
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class to access location-related operators

        Returns:
        the predicate

      • inArea

        public static Function<Item,java.lang.Boolean> inArea(java.lang.String coordinatesField,
                                                      double center_latitude,
                                                      double center_longitude,
                                                      double radius)
        Check if the coordinates value of a field is a location in an given round area.
        Parameters:
        coordinatesField - the coordinates field to check
        center_latitude - latitude of the center of the area
        center_longitude - longtitude of the center of the area
        radius - radius of the given area
        Returns:
        the predicate

      • blur

        public static Function<Item,java.util.List<java.lang.Double>> blur(java.lang.String coordinatesField,
                                                                   double blurMeters)
        Blur the coordinates value of a field and return the blurred coordinates. The blurred coordinates is a list of double, the first double element is the latitude, the second double element is the longitude.
        Parameters:
        coordinatesField - the coordinates field to blur
        blurMeters - the distance to blur, in meters
        Returns:
        the function
